name: Limerick_White_Plastic_Stackable_Modern_Dining_Chairs_(Set_of_2)
reviews: I do not want to oversell these chairs but they are a design revelation. So beautiful and minimal. The color is extremely vivid and the plastic extremely heavy duty. Just beautiful. One warning - the chairs are extremely static. Not sure why but they have some pretty serious static cling. So hair and other bizarre particles stick to the chairs. Obviously any white fan knows that you have to take extra care of white products because they show everything. But it was just an oddity of the product I thought I would share.

The chair is very light but solid. Great for both indoor and outdoor. They are stackable and can be power washed when using as outdoor setting. I use these chairs for my summer rental property and they are almost indestructible.

These chairs are much sturdier (and much prettier) than the typical white plastic outdoor chairs you see everywhere. They do hold water, so we plan on drilling a small hole in the seat for drainage. The white is a true white.
description: This set of two chairs is made with tough, thick and durable molded plastic. This chair is perfect for indoor or outdoor settings so you can create a modern retreat wherever you desire.  Set include: Two dining chairs Contemporary dining chair White molded plastic Stackable Non-marking feet Wipe clean with a damp clothDimensions: 33.75 inches high x 22.5 inches wide x 20.25 inches deep  Arm height: 25.625 inches StyleModernMaterialPlasticFinishWhite FinishChair TypeDining ChairsSet SizeSet of 2AssemblyAssembledChair Back HeightLow Back, StandardBack RestYesColorWhiteFurniture Frame MaterialPlasticFurniture PatternSolidSeat StyleSolid
